Simple. Easy to use. No BS. And Source Code is available so I can audit it and request features. Designed a lot better than many free open source apps (Feels more like it was made by an artist, not a programmer). Picks up the files on my SD Card perfectly, which is the reason I moved away from Vanilla Music, which was good until it stopped letting me play files from my SD Card all of a sudden. Now that Google Music is dead, this is the best good-looking and very similar alternative. And it's all your own music. No external services.
